title: Pick, Pack, and Ship an Order
description: A warehouse worker needs to fulfill a customer order from start to finish.

tasks.description: Retrieve a pick list for a ready order.
tasks.expected_outcome: The worker gets a list of items and their locations.

tasks.description: Pick the correct items and quantities from the warehouse locations.
tasks.expected_outcome: The worker gathers all items for the order.

tasks.description: Pack the items into a box, weigh it, and generate a shipping label.
tasks.expected_outcome: The worker packs the order and prints a shipping label.

tasks.description: Update the order status to 'shipped' and provide the tracking number.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system is updated, and the customer is notified of the shipment.
